price: 11. (Mpe) toyebisaki ye ete: Bosala na yango nguba ya komibatela na tango ya bitumba mpe bosala misala ya malamu. Mpamba te ya soló, nazali kornona maye bozali kosala.
arabic: أَنِ ٱعۡمَلۡ سَٰبِغَٰتٖ وَقَدِّرۡ فِي ٱلسَّرۡدِۖ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ani iʿ'mal sābighātin waqaddir fī al-sardi wa-iʿ'malū ṣāliḥan innī bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
